Common Issues
=============

.. _Common Issues:

------------------

A place for common issues,  such as the beepocolypse.


*Beepocolypse*
==============

This is an event that occurs on older versions of the mod (prior to 0.5.x),  
where lots of bees would collect on the border of unloaded and loaded chunks

*Solution*

Upgrade to the latest version.  Then it's reccomended to use either a flamethrower,
or if you are an admin the following commands.

        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:blue_banded_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:green_carpenter_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:yellow_black_carpenter_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:chocolate_mining_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:ashy_mining_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:digger_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:leafcutter_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:mason_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:reed_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:resin_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:sweaty_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:neon_cuckoo_bee]
        | /kill @e[type=productivebees:nomad_bee]
